title: Numerique
description: Numerique is a high end watchface with an elaborate assortment of dials for not only time, but date, temperature, and so much more.
descriptionHTML: Numerique is a high end watchface with an elaborate assortment of dials for not only time, but date, temperature, and so much more.
comments: Beautiful face but... I really love the look of this face.  However whenever I have a notification, the card takes up the whole watch face unless I dismiss it.  Needs the small cards.  I have a moto 360.  Edit:  Appreciate quick response from Dev.  My issue was fixed and I now use this face as my daily.
Force close on G watch R
Doesn't work with Sony Smartwatch 3 Blank screen when lit and frozen in dim mode. Sony Smartwatch 3.
